actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: On each of its turns, the jungle felucian warrior makes two attacks.

actions.name: Force Bolt
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 40/160, one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) force damage.

actions.name: Staff
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 1) force damage.

actions.name: Venom Strike
actions.desc: As an action, the shaman creates a poison spray that targets one creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, it takes 4d6 poison damage and is poisoned until the end of your next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and isnâ€™t poisoned. At the end of each of the shaman's turns, it rolls a d6. On a 5-6 this ability is recharged.
